title: Design vendor-agnostic screening service interface for watchlist providers
summary: Create abstraction layer for multiple KYC/AML watchlist providers (OFAC, EU, UN) to enable vendor switching without code changes. Define standardized request/response formats and error handling protocols.

title: Implement real-time OFAC, EU, UN watchlist screening API integration
summary: Build real-time API integrations to check customer data against OFAC, EU, and UN sanctions lists during signup. Must support concurrent checks across multiple providers with response aggregation.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: real-time OFAC, EU, UN watchlist screening

title: Implement <3 second response time constraint for screening checks
summary: Enforce sub-3-second response time for all watchlist screening operations to maintain smooth user onboarding experience. Include timeout handling and performance monitoring capabilities.

title: Create fallback protocol for >5s latency or service downtime
summary: Implement automated fallback mechanism that triggers when primary screening service exceeds 5-second response time or becomes unavailable. Include circuit breaker pattern and service health monitoring.

title: Implement pending account state for fallback scenarios
summary: Create pending account state workflow for users when screening service is unavailable. Allow limited account access while awaiting manual compliance review completion.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: pending account state for fallback scenarios

title: Create compliance notification system for manual screening cases
summary: Build notification system to alert compliance team when manual screening is required. Include priority queuing, SLA tracking, and escalation workflows for time-sensitive cases.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: compliance notification system for manual screening

title: Implement near-match detection and hold state logic
summary: Develop algorithms to detect potential matches requiring human review, including fuzzy name matching and date-of-birth variations. Automatically place accounts in hold state pending verification.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: near-match detection and hold state logic

title: Build manual verification workflow for ambiguous matches
summary: Create comprehensive manual review interface for compliance officers to verify ambiguous watchlist matches. Include document upload, decision tracking, and approval workflows with audit trails.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: manual verification workflow for ambiguous matches

title: Create immutable audit log for all screening attempts and results
summary: Implement tamper-proof audit logging system that records all watchlist screening attempts, results, and manual review decisions. Ensure cryptographic integrity and regulatory compliance for 7-year retention.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: immutable audit log for all screening attempts

title: Implement privacy controls for audit log access
summary: Build role-based access control system for audit logs with PII redaction capabilities. Ensure compliance with GDPR/CCPA while maintaining regulatory audit requirements.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: privacy controls for audit log access

title: Design compliance dashboard for screening outcomes and reports
summary: Create a comprehensive dashboard for compliance teams to monitor KYC/AML screening results, view historical data, and generate regulatory reports. Must include real-time metrics, filtering capabilities, and report export functionality.

title: Implement ad-hoc reporting capabilities for compliance team
summary: Build flexible reporting tools allowing compliance officers to create custom queries and reports for regulatory audits. System must support date ranges, filtering by screening results, and export to various formats.

title: Create user-facing screening status UI with verification messaging
summary: Design and implement customer-facing interface showing KYC/AML screening progress with clear status messages. Must provide transparent communication about verification steps and expected timeframes.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: user status notifications, updated onboarding flow

title: Design context-sensitive next steps UI for delays/holds
summary: Create adaptive UI components that guide users through appropriate actions when screening encounters delays or manual review holds. Interface must provide clear instructions and alternative pathways.

title: Implement encryption for screening data in transit and at rest
summary: Deploy end-to-end encryption for all KYC/AML screening data, including API communications with screening providers and database storage. Must meet financial services security standards and regulatory requirements.

title: Create data retention and purging policies per regulations
summary: Establish automated data lifecycle management for KYC/AML records to comply with varying international retention requirements. System must track retention periods and securely purge data according to regulatory timelines.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: regulatory compliance in expanding international markets

title: Develop test suite for matches, false positives, and downtime
summary: Build comprehensive testing framework to validate KYC/AML screening accuracy, measure false positive rates, and test failover mechanisms. Must include automated tests for various match scenarios and service degradation.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: automated fallback to manual review if primary service fails

title: Set up monitoring and alerting for unusual screening patterns
summary: Implement real-time monitoring system to detect anomalous screening patterns, high false positive rates, or potential compliance issues. Must trigger alerts for operations and compliance teams with actionable insights.
